name: Dart-Blaster Master
description:
Swap your weapon colour to match and blast those monsters!

Controls:

ActionKeyboard GamepadWalkWASDLeft StickAimMouseRight StickSwitch ColourLCtrl LShift Or Scroll WheelShoulder Buttons

A prototype first-person shooter project submitted for a University assignment. The brief was to create the game while making good use of the Unreal Engine 5 toolset.

Key UE5.1 engine features used:

  • AI behaviour trees
  • Animation Blueprints
  • Enhanced input  system with C++
  • Landscaping and foliage placement
  • In-engine modelling 

Find the soundtrack on Soundcloud here.
